entry.title: WIND WARNING , Estevan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:08 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Airport 10:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -6.4°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: NNW 68 km/h gust 89 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow or rain. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain early this evening then 60 percent chance of light snow later this evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 early this evening then diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 5:53 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:53 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:53 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
